Item.method_code:
'inDom format: ' <Item type='Method' action='Unlock Project Tree'> ' <body top_wbs_id='TOP_WBS_ID_VAL' handle_locked_by_current_user='1 or 0'/> ' </Item> Dim tmpInn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim tmpNd As XmlElement = CType(Me.node.selectSingleNode("body[@top_wbs_id]"), XmlElement) If IsNothing(tmpNd) Then Return tmpInn.newError("Invalid input parameters.") Dim parentID As String = tmpNd.getAttribute("top_wbs_id") Dim aml As String = String.Format("" & _ "<AML><Item type='SQL' action='SQL PROCESS'>" & _ "<PROCESS>CALL</PROCESS><name>get_locked_wbs</name><ARG1>{0}</ARG1>" & _ "</Item></AML>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(parentID)) Dim q As Item = tmpInn.newItem("", "") Dim r As Item = tmpInn.applyAML(aml) If r.isError() Then Return r
Dim useLockedByCurrentUserOnly As Boolean = (tmpNd.GetAttribute("handle_locked_by_current_user")="1") Dim s As String = String.Format("='{0}'", tmpInn.getUserID()) Dim lockedActivities As XmlNodeList = r.dom.SelectNodes("descendant::Item[@type='Activity2'][string(locked_by_id)"+IIF(useLockedByCurrentUserOnly, s, "!=''")+"]") Dim lockedWBSes As XmlNodeList = r.dom.SelectNodes("descendant::Item[@type='WBS Element'][string(locked_by_id)"+IIF(useLockedByCurrentUserOnly, s, "!=''")+"]")
Dim stepNum As Integer Dim ndList As XmlNodeList Dim lockedItem As XmlElement q.loadAML("<Item type='Activity2' action='unlock' doGetItem='0'/>") For stepNum=1 To 2 If stepNum=1 Then ndList = lockedActivities q.setAttribute("type", "Activity2") Else ndList = lockedWBSes q.setAttribute("type", "WBS Element") End If For Each lockedItem In ndList q.setAttribute("id", lockedItem.getAttribute("id")) cco.startup.debuglog("unlocking", q.dom) r = q.apply() If r.isError() Then Return r Next Next stepNum Return tmpInn.newResult("ok")
Item.name: Unlock Project Tree
